overview.title: Overview
overview.content: This application ("MCP Magic") is a developer tool that integrates Figma with AI assistants through the Model Context Protocol (MCP). We do not collect, store, or process any of your personal information.

no_data_collection.title: No Data Collection
items: Utilize cookies or local storage (except for theme preferences)

how_it_works.title: How It Works
items: Connecting to your local Figma desktop application
Acting as a bridge between Figma and AI assistants (like Claude, ChatGPT, etc.)
All processing happens in your local environment
Your Figma data never leaves your device (except to the AI service of your choice as part of the MCP protocol)

third_party_services.title: Third-Party Services
items: Figma's privacy policy applies to your Figma data
Your chosen AI service's privacy policy applies to AI interactions
We are separate from these third-party services and not responsible for their data practices

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: If we update this privacy policy, we will post the new version on this page and update the "Last Updated" date.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have questions or concerns, please open an issue on our GitHub repository

home.title: Figma MCP Magic - AI-Powered Design Automation Prompts
home.description: A curated collection of powerful prompts for Figma MCP (Model Context Protocol). Transform your design workflow with AI-powered automation, streamline annotations, automate handoff, and enhance documentation with our comprehensive prompt library.
